items.text: extra bounce outside off, punched to the same region, this time by the right-hand batsman
back of a length and just a shade outside off, steered to third man
prodded to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Mendis, no run

items.text: short, wide, punted to sweeper cover
sliced in the air to deep cover
pitched up on off, driven to deep point
good length and angling into a front-foot push to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mendis, no run

items.text: Mashrafe, into his seventh over, puts Mendis out of his misery. He couldn't find the gap, he couldn't hit over the top, he was peppered by a volley of bouncers and even copped a jarring blow on the helmet. His hamstring probably wan't in great shape either. Mendis now dares to step down the track and launch it over the bowler's head. Mashrafe smartly pulls his length back and a drop in pace also foxes Mendis and he eventually simply chips it in the air to mid-off. Nineteen runs off 34 balls at a strike-rate of 56 in a 321 chase? Not good enough I'm afraid

dismissal.text: BKG Mendis c Rubel Hossain b Mashrafe Mortaza 19 (34b 1x4 0x6) SR: 55.88

items.text: back of a length and angling across off, Dickwella scythes with fast hands to deep point

items.preText: WMC: "The art of present Sri Lankan cricket - Not rotating strike, required rate climbs high then getting panic and lose their wickets, lower order put under immense pressure, finally lose the match."
items.text: tickled to fine leg
items.postText: mano: "Sri Lankan selectors, coaches are all messing up everything. wrong selections Tharanga can no longer be a ODI opener. He is too slow in his reflections. Kusal mendis should stick to Tests. he can never be a good ODI player. wrong batting order. what more can sril anka go wrong when they are at rock bottom now. probably the worst test ICC full member"

items.text: full and angling across off, Chandimal hangs back and guides the ball to backward point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: Chandimal plays a long way in front of the body and forces the ball to the covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: flicked off the pads in front of square
short and angling away outside off, stands up tall and punches up to mid-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, no run

items.text: leans back and stabs from outside off to mid-off
full, skids in, stays low, kept out
items.postText: Say hello to Akshay, who is back for his last stint of the day
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.preText: Thanks, Deiva. May be the last stint for either of us this match. Sri Lanka crumbling. Mashrafe to continue.
items.text: good length, nipping away, flashes and gets beaten on the outside edge

items.text: short of a length, angling into him, flicked off the pads wide of deep backward square
leans forward and looks to drill this fullish ball and the ball takes the inside edge into the leg side

items.text: short of a length, angling in on off, defended
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chandimal, no run

items.text: almost chipped back to the bowler. Slower full ball, leans forward and drills it back in the direction of the bowler

items.text: short of a length, finds minimal room, jumps back and chops a punch into the surface off the inside edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Chandimal, no run

items.text: short of good length, cuts into him from outside off, stabbed to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dickwella, no run

items.text: waits for this length ball to angle in from wide of the crease before opening the face to steer to third man
short of a length,angled across on off from outside leg, stands tall and punches to extra cover
items.postText: Aminul : "Mashrafe Mortaza the old fellow impress everyone , We hope he continues his career for another 4-5 years "
